HERO_TEXT: OPAD is a premier launchpad/incubator for innovative projects on the OptimusZ7 blockchain. Join our community  of early investors and discover the top projects launching on the  OPTIMUSZ7 network.
Connect_wallet_text: Open your wallet, log in, and click 'Connect Wallet'.
Select_amount_text: Enter the amount of OZ7 coins to purchase.
Ensure_USDC_text: Make sure you have enough USDC in your wallet on the BEP-20 blockchain.
Click_Buy_text: Review details, click 'Buy', and approve in your wallet.
Connect_wallet_2_txt: Open your wallet, log in, and click 'Connect Wallet'.
Approve_txt: Approve the transaction in your wallet.
Swap_Coins_txt: When you receive your OZ7 (BEP-20), go to
Bridge_for_Real_OZ7_txt: Swap them for real OZ7 on the OptimusZ7 blockchain.

Footer_para: Opad is a premier Web3 incubator and launchpad dedicated to fostering innovation in technologies such as DeFi, AI, Big Data, NFTs, and Web3 gaming. Integrated with the OptimusZ7 blockchain, Opad offers a seamless platform for launching groundbreaking projects.
